Properties.commandText:
SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @inserted0 TABLE ([Id] int, [_Position] [int]);
MERGE [ProductImageThumbnails] USING (
VALUES (@p0, @p1, @p2, @p3, 0),
(@p4, @p5, @p6, @p7, 1),
(@p8, @p9, @p10, @p11, 2),
(@p12, @p13, @p14, @p15, 3),
(@p16, @p17, @p18, @p19, 4),
(@p20, @p21, @p22, @p23, 5),
(@p24, @p25, @p26, @p27, 6),
(@p28, @p29, @p30, @p31, 7),
(@p32, @p33, @p34, @p35, 8),
(@p36, @p37, @p38, @p39, 9),
(@p40, @p41, @p42, @p43, 10),
(@p44, @p45, @p46, @p47, 11),
(@p48, @p49, @p50, @p51, 12),
(@p52, @p53, @p54, @p55, 13)) AS i ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProudctId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProudctId])
VALUES (i.[Data], i.[Extension], i.[Name], i.[ProudctId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted0;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [ProductImageThumbnails] t
INNER JOIN @inserted0 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];

SET NOCOUNT ON;
DECLARE @inserted0 TABLE ([Id] int, [_Position] [int]);
MERGE [ProductImageThumbnails] USING (
VALUES (@p0, @p1, @p2, @p3, 0),
(@p4, @p5, @p6, @p7, 1),
(@p8, @p9, @p10, @p11, 2),
(@p12, @p13, @p14, @p15, 3),
(@p16, @p17, @p18, @p19, 4),
(@p20, @p21, @p22, @p23, 5),
(@p24, @p25, @p26, @p27, 6),
(@p28, @p29, @p30, @p31, 7),
(@p32, @p33, @p34, @p35, 8),
(@p36, @p37, @p38, @p39, 9),
(@p40, @p41, @p42, @p43, 10),
(@p44, @p45, @p46, @p47, 11),
(@p48, @p49, @p50, @p51, 12),
(@p52, @p53, @p54, @p55, 13),
(@p56, @p57, @p58, @p59, 14),
(@p60, @p61, @p62, @p63, 15),
(@p64, @p65, @p66, @p67, 16)) AS i ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProudctId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProudctId])
VALUES (i.[Data], i.[Extension], i.[Name], i.[ProudctId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted0;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [ProductImageThumbnails] t
INNER JOIN @inserted0 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];

DECLARE @inserted17 TABLE ([Id] int, [_Position] [int]);
MERGE [ProductImages] USING (
VALUES (@p68, @p69, @p70, @p71, 0),
(@p72, @p73, @p74, @p75, 1),
(@p76, @p77, @p78, @p79, 2),
(@p80, @p81, @p82, @p83, 3),
(@p84, @p85, @p86, @p87, 4),
(@p88, @p89, @p90, @p91, 5),
(@p92, @p93, @p94, @p95, 6),
(@p96, @p97, @p98, @p99, 7),
(@p100, @p101, @p102, @p103, 8),
(@p104, @p105, @p106, @p107, 9),
(@p108, @p109, @p110, @p111, 10),
(@p112, @p113, @p114, @p115, 11),
(@p116, @p117, @p118, @p119, 12),
(@p120, @p121, @p122, @p123, 13),
(@p124, @p125, @p126, @p127, 14),
(@p128, @p129, @p130, @p131, 15),
(@p132, @p133, @p134, @p135, 16),
(@p136, @p137, @p138, @p139, 17),
(@p140, @p141, @p142, @p143, 18),
(@p144, @p145, @p146, @p147, 19),
(@p148, @p149, @p150, @p151, 20),
(@p152, @p153, @p154, @p155, 21),
(@p156, @p157, @p158, @p159, 22),
(@p160, @p161, @p162, @p163, 23),
(@p164, @p165, @p166, @p167, 24)) AS i ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProductId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProductId])
VALUES (i.[Data], i.[Extension], i.[Name], i.[ProductId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted17;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [ProductImages] t
INNER JOIN @inserted17 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];

(@p132, @p133, @p134, @p135, 16),
(@p136, @p137, @p138, @p139, 17),
(@p140, @p141, @p142, @p143, 18),
(@p144, @p145, @p146, @p147, 19),
(@p148, @p149, @p150, @p151, 20),
(@p152, @p153, @p154, @p155, 21),
(@p156, @p157, @p158, @p159, 22),
(@p160, @p161, @p162, @p163, 23),
(@p164, @p165, @p166, @p167, 24)) AS i ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProductId], _Position) ON 1=0
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
INSERT ([Data], [Extension], [Name], [ProductId])
VALUES (i.[Data], i.[Extension], i.[Name], i.[ProductId])
OUTPUT INSERTED.[Id], i._Position
INTO @inserted17;

SELECT [t].[Id] FROM [ProductImages] t
INNER JOIN @inserted17 i ON ([t].[Id] = [i].[Id])
ORDER BY [i].[_Position];
